original_title: Sri Lanka’s Digital Readiness Index comes into being
original_body_lines: IQ Global, Sri Lanka’s first and only Business Design company, announced its partnership with the University of Kelaniya to promote and grow awareness about the necessity of Business Design and Digital Transformation within modern businesses using Sri Lanka’s Digital Readiness Index. The announcement took place on February 21, at the Movenpick Hotel under the patronage of guests who included the Vice Chancellor, University of Kelaniya – Snr. Professor Nilanthi De Silva.

The curated index will evaluate, prepare and inform participants of tools that will help them effectively manage and assimilate into the modern marketplace to overcome the challenges businesses face with automation, artificial intelligence, and big data.

The launch of the Digital Readiness Index, Developed by IQ Global, and validated by the University of Kelaniya, will be the first of its kind in the region. Innovation and digital readiness has been a dormant concept for most organizations in the region, with most resting on their established laurels for decades.
